snippet.title: [Aoko Aozaki] Battle Preview
snippet.description:
[Aoko Aozaki] A versatile character with set techniques and long-range magical attacks that add pressure. Her mobility and martial arts make her a tricky opponent.

"MELTY BLOOD: TYPE LUMINA" is coming to PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, Xbox One, and Steam Now on sale!
A new entry in the "MELTY BLOOD" series of 2D fighting games based on TYPE-MOON's visual novel "Tsukihime."

Official Twitter → https://twitter.com/MB_LUMINA/
Official website → https://meltyblood.typelumina.com/en/
